author: chris-dollin
msg: Found bug in AbstractTestGraphMaker - it didn't close the graph in the
test case for URI-as-name. Fixing this exposed that FileGraphMaker didn't
allow that (because the underlying file system got upset). Fixed by having
FGM map the graph names by replacing :, /, and _ by escape sequences.
